message: Hello Bob, I am pleased to offer you this product for a price of $950,000. I believe this product would be highly valuable to your business, and this price reflects its true worth.

I appreciate your offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $850,000. I believe this is a fair price considering the product's value and my budget. I'm willing to make a compromise, but I'd like to see if we can meet in the middle.
Bob, I understand your position, but my original price reflects the true value of this product. I'm willing to come down slightly to $925,000.  This is my final offer.

I appreciate your willingness to come down, but $925,000 is still a bit too high for me. I'm willing to meet you halfway between our previous offers, so I'll make a counteroffer of $875,000. I believe this is a fair price considering the product's value and my budget.
